### emitAssignment() {#a306a23214c9482f62523348c733c6f1c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void RecordStreamer::emitAssignment (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42; Symbol, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42; Value)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Emit an assignment of <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a></code> to <code>Symbol</code>.

This corresponds to an assembler statement such as: symbol = value

The assignment generates no code, but has the side effect of binding the value in the current context. For the assembly streamer, this prints the binding into the .s file.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Symbol">- The symbol being assigned to.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="<a href=&quot;/docs/api/classes/llvm/value&quot;>Value</a>">- The value for the symbol.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/object/recordstreamer-h/#l00050">50</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/object/recordstreamer-h">RecordStreamer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/object/recordstreamer-cpp/#l00089">89</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/object/recordstreamer-cpp">RecordStreamer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### emitLabel() {#aa780f89c07fb6ecf894165fba1eddd5f}

This corresponds to an assembler statement such as: foo:


<ParametersList title="Parameters">

### emitZerofill() {#a0e8d737beabc541adfb2c643314155ef}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void RecordStreamer::emitZerofill (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsection">MCSection</a> &#42; Section, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42; Symbol, uint64&#95;t Size, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> ByteAlignment, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> Loc=<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a>())</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Emit the zerofill section and an optional symbol.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Section">- The zerofill section to create and or to put the symbol</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Symbol">- The zerofill symbol to emit, if non-NULL.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Size">- The size of the zerofill symbol.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="ByteAlignment">- The alignment of the zerofill symbol.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>
